name: Dodge Stars
description:
Play dodgeball like never before!
Challenge other players in real-time matches to put your dodging skills to the test.
Throw all kinds of items to your opponent in intense PVP matches.
Get the crowd 100% excited and receive a powerful special item!

- Compete in ever more challenging Arenas.
- Quick 1v1 real-time gameplay.
- Innovative shooting and dodging control system.
- Many different throwable items to use.
- Progress through the Arenas.
- Excite the crowd to get special items.
- Play with different Dodge Stars.
